query_fields.name: In addition to the Primary objective has multiple products been discussed?
Is it correalted with APT if Product not held and effort to Sale made?
Have adequate leads been generated for relevant products?
Have all digital modes been activated?
Are logical reasons given for Not Interested Products?
If product held with competition has RM spoken to respective product group for relevant pitch for a take over?
If issue is pricing has competitive pricing been given for best deal?
If account is depleting has RM effort on getting funds been checked?
If customer is met ReKYC Aadhar Pan and Contact details addressed?
If Credit Card is not being used have the reasons been discussed?
Is the new pre-approved offer communicated to the customer by the RM?
Is the customer interested and did it result into a lead?
If lead not generated why?
Any other feedback on targeted pre-approved offers
Has the RM spoken about Marketing Campaigns?
If product is relevant and lead not generated why?
Reasons for Not Interested in Product campaigns
Is pre-call planning done with RM
Any other input for the customer
Reviewed By
Reviewed On
If account is depleting has RM effort on getting funds been checked?
Have new accounts/references been discussed by the RM
Are all accounts Active and meeting the product criteria (Minimum Balance)
Comments
